code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 48 yr old white f presents with 4 weeks history of Body Aches. Denies ever using tobacco she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 170 cm, Weight 93.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed LYRICA - 150 mg daily, and ordered ANA.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate malaise, moderate fever and moderate fatigue for 5 weeks. patient is a f marine aged 48 years. denies any alcohol use she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 169 cm, Weight 90.4 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use she states she has

td.content: s:48 year old white female marine indicates moderate malaise, moderate fever and moderate fatigue. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 91.7 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered Thoracentesis - pleural cavity.

s:pt presents with mild fatigue, mild cough and mild fever x 12 days. pt is a 49 YO white f. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 92.3 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.
